name: Space Lost 2400
description:
How To Play

  • You are spawned in a vast space.  
  • Gems fly around through space and pulse. 
  • The pulse interval becomes smaller as they are about to disappear. 
  • Try and collect the gems before your opponent does.  
  • Stay close to a gem to begin collecting after the bar fills you collect it. 
  • If other players are around the collection progress halts. 
  • Collect 5 to say you collected 5, then close the game I guess.

Notes

It uses Unity's ECS to save/restore state, however that feature is unstable so the game will eventually crash in a multiplayer session.

Local mode spawns both players at a start point. Player 1 is joystick 1 and player 2 is what is selected at the start screen.

This is a game using UnityGGPO  https://github.com/nykwil/UnityGGPO/tree/ecs_demo. See the ecs demo to see how it works.
